Tomber amoureuse du jeune homme en vaut-il le risque?\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6872240), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=783523)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.webtoons.com/en/romance/my-reason-to-die/list?title_no=3993)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/woweizhilikaideliyou/list?title_no=2099)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/romance/my-reason-to-die/list?title_no=4368)\n* [French / Français](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/romance/my-reason-to-die/list?title_no=5029)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romance/my-reason-to-die/list?title_no=4032)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0002682)","id":"Nam Jioh, seorang siswi SMA yang sedang mengalami cedera, tahu dia harus waspada pada Cha Gyeol, seorang berandalan dengan penampilan tampan dan menawan. 0a15b7c4-dbc9-4565-a5c4-2171db421cb2:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"0a15b7c4-dbc9-4565-a5c4-2171db421cb2","title":{"ja-ro":"Osu!! Karate-bu"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"押忍！！空手部"},{"en":"Osu!! Karate Club"}],"lastChapter":"483","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en","pt-br"],"relatedIds":["d9964265-30c5-4a00-b50f-4ebf41d38ed5"],"description":{"en":"The series began as a fairly humorous and lighthearted satire of Japan's teenage delinquent-gang subculture told from the perspective of Matsushita Tadashi (who also narrates these early Karate Bu stories), a 2nd year student at Kangokou High and a constant target of Kangokou's numerous bullies who beat him up routinely after school. He is almost always accompanied by his best friend Saitou Takaki, who is also constantly harassed.  \n  \nAs the pair grow increasingly tired of being victimized they decide to join the titular Karate Club, which is notorious throughout Osaka's youth gangs for training and producing the city's most hardened and toughest teenage thugs while maintaining the facade of a legit school sports club. But when they join the club, they find themselves picked on just as much if not worse by the club's current members. But as the story progresses they grow to be increasingly capable fighters.  \n  \nAlong with the manga's change in attitude and central character, the various teenage fighters throughout the series grew increasingly stronger and even began to tap into superhuman ki abilities, putting Osu!! Karate Bu in the company of other similar epic Shōnen fighting manga such as Yu Yu Hakusho, Dragon Ball, and Fist of the North Star.  \n  \nOsu!! Karate Bu was wildly popular in its native Japan, but is otherwise almost completely unknown in most other countries. It spawned a four episode OVA mini-series released over a period of two years from 1990-1992, a 1990 live action movie, and a 1994 Super Famicom fighting game."},"links":{"al":"42530","ap":"osu-karate-club","kt":"22866","mal":"12530","mu":"7u8qqi9","raw":"https://www.takeshobo.co.jp/book_d/shohin/2632901"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"07251805-a27e-4d59-b488-f0bfbec15168","name":{"en":"Thriller"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"69964a64-2f90-4d33-beeb-f3ed2875eb4c","name":{"en":"Sports"}},{"id":"799c202e-7daa-44eb-9cf7-8a3c0441531e","name":{"en":"Martial Arts"}},{"id":"b1e97889-25b4-4258-b28b-cd7f4d28ea9b","name":{"en":"Philosophical"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}}]}

a bi-monthly yuri anthology published by Houbunsha.\n\nThe magazine started in 2009 and ran until 2012, sitting right at that point in yuri manga history where creators turned away from the pure, hierarchical, class S romances of earlier yuri toward the variety of yuri stories of today. It ran alongside Yuri Hime and the now also defunct Comic Hirari and stood in stark contrast to shoujo and josei romances of the day.\n\nIts short run produced a number of classic yuri manga, including Higashiyama Shou's Prism, Arata Iri's Comprehensive Tovarisch, Notes from the Garden of Lillies, Kurogane Ken's Hoshikawa Ginza District, and Morinaga Milk's The Secret Recipe. Apart from the classics, the magazine included all sorts of, at the time, genre-defying yuri, including historical works, coworker, college, giant robot, and adult life stories, bi characters that weren't a toxic mess, and enough angst and drama to fuel the genre for a decade!\n\n**Note: Several chapters from the anthology are published separately in other mangas. Please use the Related tab to see if the chapter you are looking for is in a separate manga item.**"},"links":{"mu":"xzhgw4j"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shoujo","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"0234a31e-a729-4e28-9d6a-3f87c4966b9e","name":{"en":"Oneshot"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"51d83883-4103-437c-b4b1-731cb73d786c","name":{"en":"Anthology"}},{"id":"a3c67850-4684-404e-9b7f-c69850ee5da6","name":{"en":"Girls' Love"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"ea2bc92d-1c26-4930-9b7c-d5c0dc1b6869","name":{"en":"Cooking"}}]}

0abf5dd2-ed5f-460b-a845-ad2180d57b65:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"0abf5dd2-ed5f-460b-a845-ad2180d57b65","title":{"en":"Yuri Pop"},"altTitles":[{"en":"Bashful Little Hime-chan"},{"en":"Contradictory Mikadzuki-san"},{"en":"My Girlfriend Is My Little Sister"},{"en":"My Sister Is My Girlfriend"},{"en":"Senpai Is Special"},{"en":"The Count's Interest"},{"en":"The Ever Bashful Hime-chan"},{"en":"Tsukiko Is Stupidly Cute"},{"en":"What Happens Next"},{"ja":"ユリポップ"}],"lastChapter":"9","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"1. Hime-chan wa Tereya-san (Bashful Little Hime-chan)  \r\nTsukiko goes after Hime-chan but she got rejected in comedic ways.  \r\n  \r\n1.1. Bashful Little Hime-chan's Summer  \r\n  \r\n1.2. Bashful Little Hime-can's Winter  \r\n  \r\n2. Senpai wa Tokubetsu desu (Senpai Is Special)  \r\n  \r\n3. Kanojo wa Imouto (My Girlfriend Is My Little Sister)  \r\nSentani Miharu, an upperclassman, and Kaburagi Yuyu, an underclassman, have decided to go out with each other. Coincidentally enough, Miharu's and Yuyu's parents got married after that event. Now Miharu tries to fight off the invitations of lust with her new little sister.  \r\n  \r\n4. Tsukiko wa Bakakawa (Tsukiko Is Stupidly Cute)  \r\n  \r\n5. Hakushaku no Okiniiri (The Count's Interest)  \r\nWhen the mysterious \"Count\" takes interest in a 1st year student she instantly takes possession of her by stealing her first kiss! Shall I warm you up with a hug?”\n\n“Oh? Have you not had enough yet?”\n\nSeriously, what’s up with this situation? And just how the hell am I going to get out of this freaking game?!\n\n---\nI woke up in a strange bed, with not just one, but two lovers beside me! In this game of love, affection, and deception, I’m Elvia, the Imperial Princess, with a gaggle of men vying for my favor. Sounds great, right? Except this means I'm also stuck as the villainess while the main character is my manipulative maid, Arielle! She’s out to bring me down, and she’s got plans for my harem of men. Quá trình đánh giá năng lực theo hạng S, A, B, C, D đã được tiến hành và chuyện hiếm thấy là lần triệu hồi này quá nhiều người hùng cấp S tối thượng với cấp A ưu tú cùng quy tụ. Thêm vào đó, chỉ duy nhất Touka xếp hạng yếu kém - Người hùng cấp E có chỉ số trạng thái siêu thấp so với các bạn cùng lớp. Chưa kể kỹ năng cá nhân [Trạng Thái Dị Thường] của Touka còn vượt xa cái mốc thất bại toàn tập nơi dị giới khiến cậu bị “loại bỏ”. Trải qua bao thăng trầm đấu tranh giành giật sự sống, cậu quyết tâm trở thành ác quỷ để bắt đầu hành trình báo thù Nữ Thần."},"links":{"al":"110989","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B08KWMPS89","ap":"hazure-waku-no-joutai-ijou-skill-de-saikyou-ni-natta-ore-ga-subete-wo-juurin-suru-made","bw":"series/230059/list","cdj":"https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-2446402","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/570656","engtl":"https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/failure-frame-i-became-the-strongest-and-annihilated-everything-with-low-level-spells-manga","kt":"56077","mal":"122650","mu":"rrvu4q7","nu":"i-became-the-strongest-with-the-failure-frame","raw":"https://comic-gardo.com/episode/10834108156661738245"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"36fd93ea-e8b8-445e-b836-358f02b3d33d","name":{"en":"Monsters"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"39730448-9a5f-48a2-85b0-a70db87b1233","name":{"en":"Demons"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"5fff9cde-849c-4d78-aab0-0d52b2ee1d25","name":{"en":"Survival"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"a1f53773-c69a-4ce5-8cab-fffcd90b1565","name":{"en":"Magic"}},{"id":"ace04997-f6bd-436e-b261-779182193d3d","name":{"en":"Isekai"}},{"id":"b29d6a3d-1569-4e7a-8caf-7557bc92cd5d","name":{"en":"Gore"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"dd1f77c5-dea9-4e2b-97ae-224af09caf99","name":{"en":"Monster Girls"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}

Kể từ đó, xác chết của những người đột biến, những con thú đang tiến hóa và những chiến binh cổ đại chất đống dưới chân họ đã bắt đầu tạo ra một con đường đi đến cuối cùng."},"links":{"al":"148113","ap":"i-am-picking-up-attributes-and-items-in-last-days","engtl":"https://comics.inkr.com/title/894-i-am-picking-up-attributes-and-items-in-last-days","mu":"172550","raw":"https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/8121/"},"originalLanguage":"zh","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"5fff9cde-849c-4d78-aab0-0d52b2ee1d25","name":{"en":"Survival"}},{"id":"631ef465-9aba-4afb-b0fc-ea10efe274a8","name":{"en":"Zombies"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"9467335a-1b83-4497-9231-765337a00b96","name":{"en":"Post-Apocalyptic"}},{"id":"aafb99c1-7f60-43fa-b75f-fc9502ce29c7","name":{"en":"Harem"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

아멜리아.”\r\n원작에서 대륙을 반쯤 아작 낸 세계관 최고 악당까지 나한테 관심을 갖는다.\r\n\r\n“신사분들, 죄송하지만 영애는 오늘 제가 데려갑니다.”\r\n아니, 여주인공 너는 납치 당하는 쪽이잖아. 왜 날 납치해?\r\n\r\n이 인간들 다 미친 게 분명하다.\r\n\r\n---\r\nOriginal Webtoon: 0c28299a-35be-4016-87ab-d420e33be074:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"0c28299a-35be-4016-87ab-d420e33be074","title":{"en":"Code Geass: Suzaku of the Counterattack"},"altTitles":[{"en":"Code Geass: Hankou no Suzaku"},{"ja":"コードギアス 反攻のスザク"}],"lastChapter":"8","availableTranslatedLanguages":["pt-br","en"],"relatedIdds":["678b0682-b887-4de4-b774-addf10d16c8b"],"description":{"en":"The Empire of Brittania has invaded Japan using giant robot weapons called Knightmare Frames. Japan is now referred to as Area 11, and its people the 11s. A Brittanian who was living in Japan at the time, Lelouch, vowed to his Japanese friend Suzaku that he'd destroy Brittania. Years later, Lelouch is in high school, but regularly skips out of school to go play chess and gamble on himself. One day, he stumbles on terrorists 11s who've stolen a military secret and is caught by a member of the Brittanian task force sent after them, who is Suzaku. As the rest of the squad arrives, Suzaku is shot for disobeying orders, while the military secret, a young girl, gives Lelouch the power to make anyone obey any order. He takes command of the terrorists and leads them to crush the approaching Brittanian force. However, Suzaku is secretly made the pilot of Brittania's brand new test model Knightmare, Lancelot.
